document_data.mainbody:
Force ladder was a spell used by sorcerers and wizards.
When cast, this spell created a ladder of pure force. It was nearly invisible and had the dimensions of a regular ladder,  is width and could be between  and  in length. It was light, only weighing , but could support up to  or more. The amount of weight that the ladder could support was determined by the casters skill level. It can be used as both a barrier and a weapon against ethereal and incorporeal creatures. 
In addition to verbal and somatic components, the spell required a focus, a small ladder crafted from silver.
